info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 9 at 1:41PM EDT until September 9 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Miami FL
info.description:
* WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...A portion of southeast Florida, including the following county, Miami-Dade.
* WHEN...Until 345 PM EDT.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 141 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Miami, Hialeah, North Miami, Doral, North Miami Beach, Opa- Locka, Miami Springs, Miami Shores, El Portal, Medley, Gladeview, West Little River, Westview, Liberty City, Pinewood, Miami International Airport, Golden Glades, Biscayne Park and Virginia Gardens. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON
